unnormalised: Yaar, I love athlete bios! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh, the Flying Sikh. Inspirational! Remember the movie, Bhaag Milkha Bhaag? Makes you proud. Anyone read about Dutee Chand? Amazing story. What about cricketers? Maybe someone on Virat Kohli, his Delhi days, or even someone from the National Cricket Academy, NCA? Need more stories like P.T. Usha's struggles in Kerala, you know? Gives you a real boost.
